Not sure if my previous post on this got through. So, here it is again; apologies if it is a duplicate.

I was told by Met Arms & Armor that the press opening for the exhibit will be October 20, 2008 and the public viewing will be October 21 - January 19, 2009.

Carol



  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: nihontochicken 
  To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, October 01, 2007 9:32 PM
  Subject: [nihontostudy] Re: New York October 2008


  And when does the exhibit travel to San Francisco? Okay, yeah, I
  know. Sigh.

  NC 

  --- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, Les Dorfman <ldorfman@...> wrote:
  >
  > October-November 2008 is all I've heard so far.
  > Biggest Japanese sword exhibition ever in North America,
  > according to Ogawa-sensei, the show organizer.
  > Twelve years in the planning.
  > 13 kokuho, including two Masamune blades.
  > Not to be missed.
  > 
  > Les
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > At 01:59 PM 09/26/2007, you wrote:
  > 
  > >All, does anyone have any information on the show at the Met in NY next
  > >year ?. I am very keen on going along. I am trying to find some dates
  > >and there appears to be nothing on the Met website (yes Anka and I have
  > >to book that far ahead LOL)
  > >
  > >Any information appreciated.
  > >
  > >best
  > >
  > >Rich
